exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AttackSkin" width="256" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="123" x="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" rotation="270" top="0" height="256" source="blade03_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CardSkin" width="196" height="280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" >
	<w:Declarations>
	</w:Declarations>
	<e:Group id="CardGroup" scaleX="0.4" scaleY="0.4" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" width="490" x="0" height="700" y="0">
		<e:Image source="base_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="477" anchorOffsetY="0" height="694" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="CardIcon" width="500" height="500" horizontalCenter="0.5" verticalCenter="-100" x="34" y="35" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="40101_a_png"/>
		<e:Image source="Card_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="567" height="770" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="IconSword_png" scaleX="2" scaleY="2" left="25" bottom="20" x="60" y="626"/>
		<e:Image source="IconShield_png" scaleX="2" scaleY="2" right="20" bottom="25" x="447" y="630"/>
		<e:Label id="Name" text="呜啦啦" size="60" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="5" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="KaiTi" x="131" y="360" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="Cost" text="9" size="60" right="19" top="11" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="457" y="43" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="67" height="60"/>
		<e:Label id="Attack" text="1" size="80" left="90" bottom="20" x="124" y="624" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textAlign="left" width="90" height="80" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="HP" text="1" size="80" bottom="20" right="90" width="90" x="354" y="624" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textAlign="right" height="80" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="Skill" text="" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="130" width="414" height="154" size="50" textColor="0xffffff"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BattleSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group id="GameGroup" width="1920" height="1080" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="card_bg_png"/>
		<e:Group width="276" height="276" left="38" bottom="0" x="38" y="804" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="AvatarTop_png"/>
			<e:Image left="0" bottom="0" x="-360" y="52" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="CardGame1_json.Border_png"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="276" height="276" right="42" top="0" x="1602" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image source="AvatarBottom_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Image source="Border_png" right="0" top="0" x="-76" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="EnemyBattleBox" width="820" height="370" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" top="0" x="550" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image source="BoxTop_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="820" height="370" anchorOffsetX="0" x="-230" y="-39.00000000000003" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
			<e:Image id="Enemy_block_1" source="block01_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="196" anchorOffsetY="0" height="280" verticalCenter="0" left="70"/>
			<e:Image id="Enemy_block_2" source="block01_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="196" anchorOffsetY="0" height="280" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Image id="Enemy_block_3" source="block01_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="196" anchorOffsetY="0" height="280" verticalCenter="0" right="70"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="MyBattleBox" width="820" height="370" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-36" x="550" y="319" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image source="BoxTop_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="820" height="370" anchorOffsetX="0" x="-230" y="-39.00000000000003" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:Image id="My_block_1" source="block01_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="196" anchorOffsetY="0" height="280" verticalCenter="0" left="70"/>
			<e:Image id="My_block_2" source="block01_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="196" anchorOffsetY="0" height="280" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Image id="My_block_3" source="block01_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="196" anchorOffsetY="0" height="280" verticalCenter="0" right="70"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="320" height="290" left="20" bottom="260" x="20" y="500" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Image source="BackgroundPlayerTop_png" left="0" bottom="0" height="290" width="320" x="-16.000000000000007" y="59.99999999999994" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
			<e:Label text="卡组" size="50" left="30" x="4.999999999999993" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="10"/>
			<e:Label text="手牌" size="50" left="30" x="4.999999999999993" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="80"/>
			<e:Label text="HP" size="50" left="30" x="4.999999999999993" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="150"/>
			<e:Label text="能量" size="50" top="220" left="30"/>
			<e:Label id="MyCardNum" text="20" size="50" right="20" top="10" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="146.91" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50"/>
			<e:Label id="MyHandNum" text="0" size="50" right="20" top="80" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="146.91" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50"/>
			<e:Label id="MyHP" text="30" size="50" right="20" top="150" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="146.91" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50"/>
			<e:Label id="MyPower" text="0" size="50" top="220" right="20" width="146.91" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="320" height="290" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" right="20" top="260">
			<e:Image source="BackgroundPlayerTop_png" left="0" bottom="0" height="290" width="320" x="-16.000000000000007" y="59.99999999999994" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
			<e:Label text="卡组" size="50" left="30" x="4.999999999999993" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="10"/>
			<e:Label text="手牌" size="50" left="30" x="4.999999999999993" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="80"/>
			<e:Label text="HP" size="50" left="30" x="4.999999999999993" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="150"/>
			<e:Label text="能量" size="50" top="220" left="30"/>
			<e:Label id="EnemyCardNum" text="20" size="50" right="20" top="10" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="146.91" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50"/>
			<e:Label id="EnemyHandNum" text="0" size="50" right="20" top="80" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="146.91" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50"/>
			<e:Label id="EnemyHP" text="30" size="50" right="20" top="150" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true" anchorOffsetX="0" width="146.91" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50"/>
			<e:Label id="EnemyPower" text="0" size="50" top="220" right="20" width="146.91" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="HandCardBox" width="1100" height="280" x="368" y="741.21" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="MyTimeGroup" width="200" height="200" left="353" bottom="344">
			<e:Image source="icon_cocupation_bg_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
			<e:Label id="MyTime" text="60" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="140"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="EnemyTimeGroup" width="200" height="200" left="1383" bottom="580" visible="false">
			<e:Image source="icon_cocupation_bg_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
			<e:Label id="EnemyTime" text="60" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="140"/>
		</e:Group>
		<ns1:CardView id="ShowCard" skinName="CardSkin" scaleX="1.8" scaleY="1.8" left="150" top="0" visible="false"/>
		<e:Group id="ExitTurnGroup" width="450" height="150" right="0" bottom="60">
			<e:Image source="btn_back_orangel_up_png" width="450" height="150" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label text="结束回合" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="100" fontFamily="KaiTi" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x000000"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="TishiGroup" width="1500" height="600" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="Background_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="Tishi" text="您是先手" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="10" size="300"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DeckList" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Scroller xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
        <e:List id="list" width="200" height="400">
            <e:itemRendererSkinName>
                <e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" height="50">
                    <e:Label text="{data.label}" textColor="0xFFFFFF" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
                </e:Skin>
            </e:itemRendererSkinName>
					<e:ArrayCollection>
						<e:Array>
							<e:Object name="狂野女战士" number="2"/>
							<e:Object name="狂野女战士" number="2"/>
							<e:Object name="狂野女战士" number="2"/>
						</e:Array>
					</e:ArrayCollection>
        </e:List>
    </e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" width="1400" source="Loginbg_jpg"/>
	<e:Label id="t_loading" size="67" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" text="0%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="200" textColor="0xFFFFFF" lineSpacing="12" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="111" height="60" bold="true"/>
	<e:Image source="GameName_png" top="100" horizontalCenter="60"/>
	<e:Label text="游戏正在加载中..." size="80" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="280" bold="true" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TextInputSkin" width="800" height="80" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect right="0" left="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" text="" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" backgroundColor="0x000000" textColor="0xffffff" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left" size="80"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoginSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="BgGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" width="1400" source="Loginbg_jpg" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Image source="GameName_png" top="100" horizontalCenter="60" x="656" y="100" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image source="gamestart_png" bottom="100" horizontalCenter="0" scaleX="2" scaleY="2"/>
		<e:Group id="LoginGroup" width="1024" height="512" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="100" scaleX="1.25" scaleY="1.25" x="320" y="320" visible="false">
			<e:Image source="bg_loding_png" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0"/>
			<e:Image source="banner_advance_yell_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="459" anchorOffsetY="0" height="111.8" horizontalCenter="0" top="30"/>
			<e:Label text="请您先登录" horizontalCenter="0" top="40" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="67" textColor="0x000000" bold="true"/>
			<e:Label text="账号：" size="50" left="20" verticalCenter="-80" textColor="0x000000"/>
			<e:TextInput id="account" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" skinName="TextInputSkin" verticalCenter="-80" right="50"/>
			<e:Label text="密码：" size="50" left="20" verticalCenter="20" textColor="0x000000"/>
			<e:TextInput id="password" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" skinName="TextInputSkin" verticalCenter="20" right="50" displayAsPassword="true"/>
			<e:Group id="denglu" width="300" height="84" left="150" bottom="30">
			<e:Image source="Button_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" bottom="0" right="0" top="0" scale9Grid="87,0,182,84"/>
			<e:Label text="登录" size="40" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group id="zhuce" width="300" height="84" bottom="30" right="150">
			<e:Image source="Button_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" bottom="0" right="0" top="0" scale9Grid="87,0,182,84"/>
			<e:Label text="注册" size="40" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Label id="Mark" text="" y="336.8" size="50" left="175" textColor="0xfc0200"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainMenu" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" source="bg5_png"/>
	<e:Group id="NormalGame" width="700" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-100">
		<e:Image source="Button_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="700" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="匹配对战" size="80" fontFamily="KaiTi" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="Shop" width="700" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="150">
		<e:Image source="Button_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="700" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="卡片商店" size="80" fontFamily="KaiTi" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="MyDeck" width="700" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="400">
		<e:Image source="Button_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="700" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label text="我的卡组" size="80" fontFamily="KaiTi" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="banner_advance_yell_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-400" height="200" width="800"/>
	<e:Label text="主界面" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-430" size="100" textColor="0x000000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="KaiTi" bold="true"/>
	<e:Group id="WaitGroup" width="1500" height="300" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="Background_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="1500" height="300" x="-399.99999999999994" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label text="正在寻找对手，请稍后..." scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="120"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MyCard" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="bg_loding_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group width="500" height="100" x="1402.24" y="10">
		<e:Image source="banner_advance_yell_png" x="0" y="0" height="106.06" width="500" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="73,9,270,35"/>
		<e:Label text="我的卡组" size="70" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="700" height="150" top="20" left="350">
		<e:Image source="banner_advance_yell_png" x="0" y="0" height="150" width="700" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="73,9,270,35"/>
		<e:Label text="我的收藏" size="120" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-9"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="DeckGroup" width="620.6" height="1051.09" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" right="-39" bottom="-40">
		<e:Image source="BoxTop_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="0" top="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="118,111,1714,333"/>
		<e:Scroller width="483.33" height="908.72" y="69.64" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="68.64" scrollPolicyH="off" scrollPolicyV="auto" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Group id="DeckBox" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="1360.61" height="772.73" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" top="132" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image source="BoxTop_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="104,87,1745,410" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Scroller width="1218.85" height="640" y="68" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="70" scrollPolicyH="auto" scrollPolicyV="off" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Group id="CardBox" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" x="-548" y="0">
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="back" source="BACK_png" width="120" height="125" left="30" top="20" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
	<e:Group id="SaveDeck" width="400" height="100" left="476" bottom="53">
		<e:Image x="0" y="0" height="100" width="400" anchorOffsetY="0" source="btn_back_orangel_up_png" scale9Grid="27,14,169,51"/>
		<e:Label text="保存卡组" size="75" textColor="0x000000" bold="true" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="tishiGroup" width="1600" height="400" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="Background_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" scale9Grid="39,21,244,43"/>
		<e:Label id="tishi" text="卡组不足20张" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="250"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ShopSkin" width="1920" height="1080" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="EventBG_16_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group width="317" height="120" top="30" right="30" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5">
		<e:Image source="Background_png" right="0" scale9Grid="39,23,239,39" anchorOffsetY="0" height="128" x="65" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="cions01_png" x="12.5" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="Coins" text="100" size="60" verticalCenter="0" right="18"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="BuyPack" width="700" height="200" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="200" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
		<e:Image verticalCenter="0" left="0" right="0" scale9Grid="27,4,167,70" source="Button1_png" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label text="购买经典卡包" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="100" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="Arial"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="CardBox" width="1800" height="800" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="BoxTop_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="0" left="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<ns1:CardView id="card_1" width="196" height="280" skinName="CardSkin" top="120" left="100" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5"/>
		<ns1:CardView id="card_2" width="196" height="280" skinName="CardSkin" top="120" left="425" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5"/>
		<ns1:CardView id="card_3" width="196" height="280" skinName="CardSkin" top="120" left="750" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5"/>
		<ns1:CardView id="card_4" width="196" height="280" skinName="CardSkin" top="120" left="1075" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5"/>
		<ns1:CardView id="card_5" width="196" height="280" skinName="CardSkin" top="120" left="1400" scaleX="1.5" scaleY="1.5"/>
		<e:Group id="sure" width="383" height="140" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="230">
			<e:Image source="Button1_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label text="确认" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="100" fontFamily="SimHei" textColor="0x000000"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="tishi" width="1600" height="600" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="Background_png" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label text="金币不足" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="250"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="back" width="120" height="100" left="80" top="50">
		<e:Image source="BACK_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
